title: Lakshmi Temple Jhumkaalu with Emerald Accent
materials: and Emerald Faceted Accent. Each earring boasts a solid gold foundation for enduring quality.
features: Intricately handcrafted jhumkas featuring a central Goddess Lakshmi motif, indicative of traditional South Indian temple jewelry. The deity is placed within a diamond-studded circular frame, leading to delicate gold bead dangles. The top includes a crown-like design, accented with a faceted emerald.
colors: complemented by the vibrant green of the emerald and the sparkling white of the Cubic Zirconia. The combination is a classic South Indian palette often seen in bridal jewelry.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Dussehra
and traditional ceremonies like Seemantham and Half-Saree Function. These are also suitable for formal cultural events where a touch of heritage is desired.
description: These Lakshmi Temple Jhumkas are a timeless representation of South Indian heritage. The intricate craftsmanship, combined with the auspicious presence of Goddess Lakshmi, makes them not just a beautiful adornment but a symbol of prosperity and good fortune. The Hyderabadi polish adds a unique luster, ensuring the gold's radiance lasts for generations. The combination of traditional design and modern setting techniques ensures both durability and comfort.
